body_html:
Hi,

Please use the forum to ask questions. Github issues are for bug or new features only.

Your question has been answered here. Variables don't exist anymore, but it is exactly the same problem.

body:
Hi,

Please use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask questions. Github issues are for bug or new features only.

Your question has been answered [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/strange-behavior-of-variable-cuda-and-variable-grad/1642). `Variable`s don't exist anymore, but it is exactly the same problem.
